cases.title: Change name
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Редактирай".
Enter new valid name in the "Име" field.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: The user changes its name and a confirmation message is displayed.

cases.title: Change surname
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Редактирай".
Enter new valid surname in the "Фамилия" field.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: The user changes its name and a confirmation message is displayed.

cases.title: Empty fields
cases.description: Do not enter name and surname
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Редактирай".
Delete the name from the "Име" field and leave it empty.
Delete the surname from the "Фамилия" field and leave it empty.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: An error message is displayed.

cases.title: Change name and surname
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Редактирай".
Enter new valid name in the "Име" field.
Enter new valid surname in the "Фамилия" field.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: A confirmation message indicating that the user changes its name and surname is displayed.

cases.title: Change password
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Промени парола".
Enter the current password in the "Текуща парола" field.
Enter the new password in the "Нова парола" field.
Enter the new password again in the "Потвърдете новата парола".
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: The user changes its password and simultaneously with that it is logged out.

cases.title: Empty password change
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Промени парола".
Enter the current password in the "Текуща парола" field.
Leave the "Нова парола" field empty.
Leave the "Потвърдете новата парола" empty
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: An error message is displayed.

cases.title: Change email
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Промени парола".
Tick on the "Промени Е-mail" checkbox.
Enter a new email address in the "Email" field.
Enter the password in the "Текуща парола" field.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: The user changes its email and simultaneously with that it is logged out.

cases.title: Invalid new email
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Промени парола".
Tick on the "Промени Е-mail" checkbox.
Enter an invalid new email address in the "Email" field.
Enter the password in the "Текуща парола" field.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: An error message is displayed.

cases.title: Change address
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Редактирай" under "Адрес за доставка".
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Type a valid phone number in the "Телефон" field.
Click on "ЗАПИШИ АДРЕС".
steps.expected_result: A confirmation message indicating that the address is changed is displayed.

cases.title: Add new address
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Моите адреси" under the "Моят профил" section.
Click on "ДОБАВИ НОВ АДРЕС".
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Type a valid phone number in the "Телефон" field.
Click on "ЗАПИШИ АДРЕС".
steps.expected_result: A confirmation message indicating that a new address is added is displayed.

cases.title: Delete address
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.
3. An address in the "Допълнителни адресни записи" is already present.

steps.action: Click on "Моите адреси" under the "Моят профил" section.
Navigate to the "Допълнителни адресни записи".
Click on "Изтрий" next to a single address.
Click on "ОК" on the pop-up window
steps.expected_result: The address is deleted and a confirmation message indicating that is also displayed.

cases.title: Sucessful invoice details change.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Редактирай" under the "Данни за фактура" section.
Change the name in the "Име" field.
Change the name in the "Фамилия" field.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: The user changes its invoicing details.

cases.title: Succesful adding of the "Allow remote shopping assistance" option.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Настройки на профил" under the "Моят профил" section.
Tick on the "Allow remote shopping assistance" checkbox.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: A confirmation message that the profile is updated with this option is displayed.

cases.title: Succesful removal of the "Allow remote shopping assistance" option.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg.
2. Click on the "human" icon at the top of the header.

steps.action: Click on "Настройки на профил" under the "Моят профил" section.
Tick on the "Allow remote shopping assistance" checkbx.
Click on "ЗАПАЗИ".
steps.expected_result: A confirmation message that the profile is updated with this option is displayed.

cases.title: Login page
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. The user is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
steps.expected_result:
The system opens and the following fields are displayed:

* Email.
* "Парола".

cases.title: Empty fields
cases.description: Log in without entering email and password.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Leave the "**Email**" and "**Парола**" fields empty.
Click on the "**ВХОД**" button underneath the "**Email**" and "**Парола**" fields.
steps.expected_result:
The following message is displayed:

"**Това е задължително поле.**"

cases.title: Empty email field
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Leave the "**Email**" field empty.
Click on the "**ВХОД**" button underneath the "**Email**" field.
steps.expected_result:
The following message is displayed:

"**Това е задължително поле.**"

cases.title: Empty password field
cases.description: Log in without entering a password.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Leave the "**Парола**" field empty.
Click on the "**ВХОД**" button underneath the "**Парола**" field.
steps.expected_result:
The following message is displayed:

"**Това е задължително поле.**"

cases.title: Non-existing user
cases.description: Log in without a real account
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Enter **username** and **password.**
Click on the "**ВХОД**" button underneath the username and "**Парола**" fields.
steps.expected_result:
The following message is displayed:

"**Влизането в профила е неправилно или профилът Ви е деактивиран временно. Моля, изчакайте и опитайте отново по-късно.**"

cases.title: Login with Facebook
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Click on "**Вход с Facebook**".
steps.expected_result: A pop-up window appears allowing you to log in with Facebook.

cases.title: Login with Google
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Click on "**Вход с Google**".
steps.expected_result: A pop-up window appears allowing you to log in with Google.

cases.title: Forgotten password
cases.description: Verity whether you can reset password
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Click on "**Забравена парола**".
Enter email address in the "**Email**" field.
Click on "**НОВА ПАРОЛА**".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that a link for resetting the password should be displayed.

cases.title: Registration page
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. User is not logged in to the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon.
Click on "**РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ**".
steps.expected_result:
The system is opened and following sections are present:

* "Име".
* "Фамилия".
* "Email".
* "Парола".
* "Потвърди паролата".

cases.title: Logout function
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. The user is logged into the system.

steps.action: Click on the "**human**" icon located on the top right side of the header.
Enter valid email.
Enter valid password in the "Парола".
Click on "ВХОД".
Logout by clicking on "Изход".
steps.expected_result: A page with confirmation that you are logged out appears and after 5 seconds you are redirected to the main page.

cases.title: Profile page
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. The user is logged into the system.

steps.action: Click on the "human" icon.
Enter a valid email.
Enter valid password in the "**Парола**" field.
Click on "**ВХОД**".
steps.expected_result:
The system is opened and the following form containing the below sections is present:

* "**Настройки на профил**" which includes:

1. "**Информация за контакт**".
2. "**Бюлетини**".

* "**Моите адреси**" which includes:

1. "**Адрес за доставка**".
2. "**Данни за фактура**".

cases.title: Successful registration
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Click on the "human" icon.
Click on "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ".
Fill in the mandatory fields.
Enter the same password in the "Потвърди паролата" field.
Tick on the mandatory checkboxes.
Click on "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that you must verify your profile by checking your email should be displayed.

cases.title: Unsuccessful registration
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Click on the "human" icon.
Click on "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ".
Leave the "Име" field empty.
Fill in all of the rest mandatory fields.
Enter the same password in the "Потвърди паролата" field.
Tick on the mandatory checkboxes.
Click on "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ".
steps.expected_result: An error message appears asking you to fill in all mandatory fields.

cases.title: Password in masked format
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Click on the "human" icon at the top right side of the page.
Enter valid email in the "Email" field.
Start entering a valid password in the "Парола".
steps.expected_result: The password should be masked when typing it.

cases.title: Add product to the basket
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Шалове" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

cases.title: Increase the quantity of the product from the basket
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Чорапи" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on the "+" button under "Количество" section.
steps.expected_result: The page loads and the quantity of the product is increased.

cases.title: Add different types of products
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Чорапи" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.
Click on "Шалове" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the products are visible in it.

cases.title: Remove products from basket
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Чорапи" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.
Click on "Шалове" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the products are visible in it.

steps.action: Navigate to the "bin" icon next to a single product and click on it.
steps.expected_result: The product is removed from the basket.

cases.title: Confirm product page opens from the basket
cases.description: Click on a prodcut from the basket and verify that the user is redirected to the product detail page.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Шалове" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on the title of the product under the "Артикул" column.
steps.expected_result: The page reloads and the product detail page opens.

cases.title: Valid coupon
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Гривни" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "**Ако имате промо код или код за ваучер, въведето го тук**".
Enter the number of the valid coupon in the empty field and click on "ПРИЛОЖИ".
steps.expected_result: The price of the basket is discounted.

cases.title: Invalid coupon
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Гривни" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "Ако имате промо код или код за ваучер, въведето го тук".
Enter the number of invalid coupon in the empty field and click on "ПРИЛОЖИ".
steps.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the coupon is invalid and the price of the basket does not change.

cases.title: Shoping basket memory
cases.description: Add product(s) to the basket and check whether it will be saved.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Гривни" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Close the browser and reopen the same site.
Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The product(s) is/are still visible in the basket.

cases.title: Checkout page
cases.description: Confirm that the user is redirected to the checkout page after clicking on the checkout button.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Гривни" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product(s) is/are visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
steps.expected_result: The user is redirected to the checkout page.

cases.title: Details of the product in the Checkout page
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Click on "Обобщение на поръчката".
steps.expected_result:
A window showing all the details of the product such as:

* Name.
* Quantity.
* Amount.

is displayed.

cases.title: Details of the shipping address in the Checkout page
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
steps.expected_result:
A page showing the following fields, under "Адрес за доставка" is displayed:

* "Име".
* "Фамилия".
* "Телефон".
* "Държава".
* "Доставка".
* "Град".
* "Пощенски код".
* "Адрес".

cases.title: Invalid input in the checkout address page
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Enter invalid telephone number in the "Телефон" field.
steps.expected_result: An error message is displayed.

cases.title: Payment options availability
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Enter valid telephone number in the "Телефон" field.
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Click on "НАПРЕД".
steps.expected_result: A page with the payment options is displayed.

cases.title: Payment options variety
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Enter valid telephone number in the "Телефон" field.
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Click on "НАПРЕД".
Click on "Наложен платеж".
steps.expected_result: The next page opens and indication that the order is successful is displayed.

cases.title: Decrease the quantity of the product from the basket
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Чорапи" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click several time on the "+" button under "Количество" section.
steps.expected_result: The page loads and the quantity of the product is increased.

steps.action: Click on the "-" button under "Количество" section.
steps.expected_result: The page loads and the quantity of the product is decreased.

cases.title: The amount of all added products is displayed correctly
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Чорапи" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.
Click on "Шалове" from the pop-up window.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the products are visible in it

steps.action: Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the products are visible in it with the correct amount.

cases.title: Order number present
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Enter a valid telephone number in the "Телефон" field.
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Click on "НАПРЕД".
Click on "Наложен платеж".
steps.expected_result: The next page opens and an indication that the order is successful is displayed along with the order number.

cases.title: Edit the delivery address of an order
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Enter a valid telephone number in the "Телефон" field.
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Click on "НАПРЕД".
Click on the pen icon next to the "Доставка до" section.
steps.expected_result: A page where the address can be changed is displayed.

cases.title: Edit the method of delivery of an order
cases.preconditions:
1. Open teodor.bg
2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on "Папионки" from the pop-up window.
Hover over a single product and click on "ДОБАВИ".
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that the product is added to the basket is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.
steps.expected_result: The basket is opened and the product is visible in it.

steps.action: Click on "КЪМ ЗАВЪРШВАНЕ".
Enter a valid telephone number in the "Телефон" field.
Type "София" in the "Град" field and choose the suggestion that is displayed.
From the "Офис" dropdown menu select "СОФИЯ - ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ, бул. ЧЕРНИ ВРЪХ No 67".
Click on "НАПРЕД".
Click on the pen icon next to the "Метод на доставка" section.
steps.expected_result: A page where the method of delivery can be changed is displayed.

cases.title: Product limits
cases.preconditions:

2. Navigate to "АКСЕСОАРИ" from the header panel.

steps.action: Click on the "shopping bag" icon in the top right corner of the page.

steps.action: Click on the "+" icon repeteadly until you can not add more of the same item.
steps.expected_result: A message indicating that more numbers of the can not be added.

cases.title: Successful change of product parameter
cases.preconditions:

2. Navigate to "OБЛЕКЛО" section.

steps.action: Click on "МЕЛАНЖИРАН ПУЛОВЕР В БОРДО С БРОДЕРИЯ ЛОГО"

Click on "ДОБАВИ".

cases.title: Search field presence
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page.
steps.expected_result: A magnifying glass icon should be displayed.

cases.title: Placeholder text

cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
steps.expected_result: Placeholder text with correct spelling and grammar should be displayed.

cases.title: Cursor presence
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and hover on the magnifying glass icon.
steps.expected_result: A cursor should be displayed.

cases.title: Correct keywords search function
cases.description: Make sure the search function is generating the correct result for the correct keywords.
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "тениска".
steps.expected_result: Results with only the specific keyword should be displayed.

cases.title: Search function shows correct result
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "тениска".
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: A page with results should be displayed.

cases.title: Invalid keywords
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "потвърди".
steps.expected_result: An error message indicating that nothing has been found should be displayed.

cases.title: Validate pagination existing
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "тениска".
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: A page with results should be displayed along with pagination indication the number of pages.

cases.title: Search results pagination
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "тениска".
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: A page with results for the specified word should be displayed along with a pagination indication of the number of pages.

steps.action: Click on the second page.
steps.expected_result: Another page with results for the specified keyword should be displayed.

cases.title: Minimum range for keyword search
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "аб".
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: An error message indicating that you need to enter more letters is displayed.

cases.title: Maximum range for keyword search
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type a vast amout of letters.
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: An error message indicating that you need to write fewer letters is displayed.

cases.title: Keyword should remain in the search field
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Type "тениска".
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: A page with results should be displayed.

steps.action: Please navigate back.
steps.expected_result: The keyword should remain in the search field.

cases.title: Search with blank space
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Put blank space in the search field using the Space key from the keyboard.
Press the Enter key from the keyboard.
steps.expected_result: The page should remain as it is - without displaying results

cases.title: Search with special characters
cases.preconditions: Open teodor.bg

steps.action: Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Enter a special symbol in the search field.
Hit enter.
steps.expected_result: An error message indicating that you need to enter more characters is displayed.

cases.title: Copy and paste availability in the search field.
cases.preconditions: The user is logged in.

steps.action: Type the keyword "дънки" on an external document and copy it from there.
Click on this link: https://teodor.bg/.
Navigate to the top right side of the page and click on the magnifying glass icon.
Paste the keyword in the search field.
steps.expected_result: Results for the pasted keyword should be displayed.

cases.title: Product code search function

cases.title: Search with alphanumeric characters

Enter an alphanumeric character in the search field.

steps.expected_result: An error message indicating that you need to enter more characters is displayed.
